channel.title: Alice G Herbison
channel.description: Recent content on Alice G Herbison

item.description: Go back home Now Last updated: Saturday, 2nd June 2018 Online working a little each week on this site helping the wonderful RURA with their website for the launch of their new album Offline preparing to sit the Level 2 Fitness Instructor (Exercise to Music) qualification trying to stop getting injured and hold down a gym routine learning Korean (안녕하세요!)

Go back home Privacy This website uses Google Analytics, deployed via Google Tag Manager, to understand how visitors browse this site through metrics such as page hits, landing pages, and referrer information. Data collected via Google Analytics is anonymised. You can opt-out of being tracked by Google Analytics through a browser plugin available from Google, or amend your cookie preferences in your browser settings.

Go back home About this site Last updated: Saturday, 2nd June 2018 Even though this site is tiny without much content at the moment, I want every design and code decision I make to meet the following two principles: Lean and fast as possible - no unnecessary frameworks or third-party scripts, and no design decisions that contradict this Accessible - meets WCAG 2.0 AAA criteria and validates by W3C with no errors This is also a learning exercise to deepen my own understanding of web best practices and development tools.
